Data Fields
mq_attr Struct Reference

#include <mqueue.h>

Detailed Description

This structure defines the attributes for a message queue.

Data Fields

long mq_flags
 
long mq_maxmsg
 
long mq_msgsize
 
long mq_curmsgs
 

Field Documentation

long mq_attr::mq_curmsgs

number of messages currently queued

long mq_attr::mq_flags

message queue flags

long mq_attr::mq_maxmsg

the maximum number of messages

long mq_attr::mq_msgsize

the message size
